== Logistics ==

The following information will be useful when booking your travel and lodging 
details in Ann Arbor.  Information regarding local attractions and food will
be added over time.

=== Venue ===

All meetings (DICE, perfSONAR-Dev) are scheduled the week of 09/08-09/12 
and will be held in the MITC Building where Internet2 has its office.
Internet2's address is: 

1000 Oakbrook Drive, 
Suite 300, 
Ann Arbor, MI 48104

A map and driving directions can be found at:  

http://www.michitc.org/cc/08/index.html

=== Airport Information ===

The closest international Airport is Detroit 
([http://www.metroairport.com/ DTW]).  The major domestic carrier is Northwest
airlines ([http://www.nwa.com NWA]) but the airport is serviced by all other
major carriers.  International service can be found on the following carriers
to the the list cities (possibly more than what I was able to find via 
wikipedia):

 # Air France (Paris-Charles de Gaulle)
 # KLM (Amsterdam)
 # Lufthansa (Frankfurt)
 # Northwest Airlines (Amsterdam, Düsseldorf, Frankfurt, London-Gatwick, London-Heathrow, Paris-Charles de Gaulle )

Please allow the usual 1 hour domestic/2 hrs international for security 
procedures.

=== Ground Transportation ===

Ann Arbor is 25 miles (40 km) from DTW.  Driving directions can be found 
[http://maps.google.com/maps?f=d&hl=en&geocode=&saddr=DTW&daddr=3200+Boardwalk,+Ann+Arbor,+Michigan+48108&sll=37.0625,-95.677068&sspn=56.200193,102.65625&ie=UTF8&z=11 here].

All major car rental vendors (Alamo, Avis, Budget, Enterprise, Hertz, Thrifty, 
etc.) are available.  It is recommended that reservations be made prior to 
arrival.

Additionally, a shared van/bus service is available for $15 USD each way between
Ann Arbor and DTW: http://michiganflyer.com .  This service picks up at some
of the major hotels near the Internet2 office, and it is recommended that
arrangements be made beforehand.

=== Lodging ===

Please note the deadline to take advantage of the reserved block is Wednesday,
August 13.  Any questions or problems with making a reservation can be directed
to Jocelyn Gerich (jgerich with an internet2 address) or after August 10th to
Cecelia Dove (cdove with an internet2 address).  

Internet2 has reserved a block of rooms at the Four Points by Sheraton which 
is about a 10 minute walk from our office. The room block is in effect for 
the following dates: arrival on Sunday, September 7 and departure on Friday, 
September 12.  The room block deadline is Wednesday, August 13. After that 
time, reservations will be accepted on a space availability basis only and 
are subject to prevailing rates.

The room block rate is $92.00 USD (plus taxes - currently 8%). This is for
